name: Fence URL wp-login.php
author: Rohit Harsh

sections.description:
*Fence url is a very light plugin that lets you easily and safely change wp-login.php to anything you want.The wp-admin directory and wp-login.php page become inaccessible, so you should bookmark or remember the url. Deactivating this plugin brings your site back exactly to the state it was before.

Compatibility

All login related things such as the registration form, lost password form, login widget and expired sessions just keep working.

It’s also compatible with any plugin that hooks in the login form, including
sections.installation:
1. Go to Plugins › Add New.
  2. Search for Rename wp-login.php.
  3. Look for this plugin, download and activate it.
  4. Go to settings submenu name as Fence option
  • Initial version.

short_description: Change wp-login.php to anything you want.
